title: The Coming of Noah's 2nd Ark: Apocalypse & Hyperspace Jumping
description: An alternate cover for this ASIN can be found here.Will Climate Change Trigger a World War?  The immense popularity of time travel and hyper-space jumps shows the earnest desire of humans to travel faster than the speed of light.  Suppose somebody invents a theory to achieve light speed, what’ll be the reaction of the world? If the inventor then runs away from America to a fundamentalist Islamic state – what’ll be the commotion? A light-speed missile or spacecraft attached with nuclear warhead means no country will be safe from its reach!  And to add salt to the wound, if global warming & climate change assume catastrophic proportions and threaten life on Earth, how will the mankind manage it?  Again, if climate change triggers a 3rd World War, will we survive, or perish like the mighty dinosaurs? Will God send another Ark then to save mankind as he did during Noah’s time?  Meanwhile the light-speed spacecraft tries hyperspace and interstellar jumps- will it succeed in transporting life from Earth? The time factor is very crucial!  The story also revolves around a subtle love affair between two Indian American commandos on an espionage mission to hijack the light-speed spacecraft from Iran. Later it turns into a love triangle.  And you’re going to experience everything in this action packed revelation...
author: Matthew Ilayathu
